channel.title: How to change background of client?
channel.description: ok i want to change the background of client of the inventory and the chat box cuz i dont like the 1 i have atm, what can i do?

item.title: How to change background of client?
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

there are like 100 sprites and they are not images…and how do i know background and inventory sprite and how i replace them?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2010, 09:23:32 pm[/size][hr]need help with this:
there are like 100 sprites and they are not images…and how do i know background and inventory sprite and how i replace them?

sorry for double post but i have waited a few hours and no answer
